name: Faster (itch) (Double Dash)
description:
Shoot all the enemies in a room to make a portal open. Enter the portal to get send to the next room full of enemies. Every time you kill an enemy, the game gets faster. Find out how long you can survive! 

Controls: 

Movement: WASD or the arrow - keys

Shooting: Left mouse button

Respawn: R

Quit: Escape
